TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionTextItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示智能标记面板上的静态文本项。

span.span: Represents a static text item on a smart tag panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的单个静态文本项。The class represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel. 通过从对方法的调用返回组, 将各个项关联起来以形成面板。Individual items are associated together to form a panel by returning the group from a call to the method. 最常见的情况是, 使用静态文本项在面板中创建信息标签。Most commonly, a static text item is used to create an informative label in a panel. 单击静态文本项将不会执行任何操作。Clicking on a static text item causes no action. 派生类型通常用于创建不同类别的标签。The derived type is typically used to create labels to separate categories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关实现智能标记的完整示例, 请参阅[如何:将智能标记附加到 Windows 窗体组件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

Public Sub New (displayName As String, category As String)

span.span: The panel text for this item.

param.name: category
param.span: 用于组合面板上类似项的类别。

span.span: The category used to group similar items on the panel.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将属性设置为`null`。 The constructor sets the property to `null`. 有关如何`category`使用参数对面板上的项进行分组的详细信息, 请参阅方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关实现智能标记的完整示例, 请参阅[如何:将智能标记附加到 Windows 窗体组件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233).
